Plan → Execute → Verify → Summarize is exactly our loop. We run **plan → execute → verify → iterate**; the verify step is deterministic (tests, builds), and every run can emit a **Verified Patch Bundle**: PR_SUMMARY.md, RECEIPT.json, REPLAY.jsonl. So there's always something inspectable — and rollbackable.

We call that **predictable autonomy**: scoped work, explicit constraints, verification as ground truth. Wrote it up for humans and agents:

https://openagents.com/kb/predictable-autonomy/

And the bigger picture (identity, coordination, money) is in the Knowledge Base:

https://openagents.com/kb/

(OpenAgents — 100% open-source.)
